Public Class KeysConverter Inherits TypeConverter Implements IComparer
public ref class KeysConverter : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter, System::Collections::IComparer
type KeysConverter = class inherit TypeConverter interface IComparer

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他表示形式之间相互转换的 。

span.span: Provides a to convert objects to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的情况是, 使用类型转换器将实例相互转换为其对应的本地化表示形式。Most commonly, the type converter is used to convert instances to and from their corresponding localized representations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将转换为。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a to a . 此示例假设已在命名`TextBox1` `Form1`上命名为。This example assumes that you have a named `TextBox1` on a named `Form1`. [!code-csharp[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Generalized Type Conversion
How to: Implement a Type Converter

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是编译器为类提供的默认构造函数。This is the default, compiler-supplied constructor for the class. 通常, 您不会直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a . 相反, 调用 类的方法。Instead, call the method of class. 有关详细信息, 请参阅基类中的示例。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

span.span: The default implementation for this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的标准实现中未使用参数。`context`The `context` parameter is not used in the standard implementation of this method. 如果列表是独占的, 则任何其他值都是无效的, 例如, 在数据类型中。If the list is exclusive, then no other values are valid, such as in an data type. 如果列表不是独占的, 则除了标准值的列表之外, 还有其他一些有效值。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values provides.
